articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: The Royal family attends London's Festival of Remembrance
articles.description: The Royal family attended this year's Festival of Remembrance held at Royal Albert Hall in London, marking 100 years since the end of World War One. The festival began in 1927 as a way to pay tribute to those who had fought and died in the first World War.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Prescription drug with fish oil reduces risk of heart attack or stroke, study finds
articles.description: A new study found that a prescription drug made of pure fish oil could significantly reduce the risk of heart attack or stroke. The drug, called Vascepa, is FDA approved and costs $278 a month.
